title: Zaineb Smida
text:
Associate professor (Maître de conférences) at INSA Lyon, France, since September 2023, and a member of the PSPM team at Institut Camille Jordan (ICJ). I defended my Ph.D under the supervision of Ali Gannoun and Lionel Cucala at University of Montpellier in November 2021.



Functional Data Analysis
Scan Statistics (Cluster Detection)
Statistical Testing
Spatial Statistics
Asymptotic Theory

title: Research
text: Z. Smida. Comparison tests of two populations and spatial scan statistics for functional data. Institut Montpelliérain Alexander Grothendieck (IMAG), University of Montpellier. Link

title: Research
text:
Publications
Z. Smida, L. Cucala, A. Gannoun, G. Durif (2021). A Wilcoxon-Mann-Whitney spatial scan statistic for functional data. Computational Statistics and Data Analysis. Link
Z. Smida, L. Cucala, A. Gannoun, G. Durif (2022). A median test for functional data. Journal of Nonparametric Statistics. Link
C. Frévent, A. Mohamed-Salem, J. Soula, Z. Smida, L. Cucala, S. Dabo-Niang, M. Genin (2023). The R Package HDSpatialScan for the Detection of Clusters of Multivariate and Functional Data using Spatial Scan Statistics. The R Journal. Link
Z. Smida, G. Durif, L. Cucala (2023). The R package funStatTest : Statistical Testing for Functional Data. Link

title: Research
text:
On going works
M. Berrada, Z. Smida, C. Thomas-Agnan (2023+). Comparing mass concentrations of two marked point processes. Applications to veterinary shortage.
A. Archimbaud, Z. Smida, A. Ruiz-Gazen (2023+). A multivariate test of unimodality.

title: Teaching
text:
2022-2023 : Toulouse School of Economics, University of Toulouse Capitole

Introduction to big data. (Master 1): Statistics, Econometrics, Data Science for Social Sciences. Lectures and practicals with the R software. (In English).
Inferential statistics. (2d year): Economics, Management, and ENS Cachan preparatory class. Tutorials. (In French).
Learning mathematical techniques and tools. (1st year): Economics and MIASHS. Tutorials. (In French).
Mathematics for economics and management 1 and 2. (1st year): Economics and Management. Tutorials. (In French).
Mathematics 1. (1st year): Economics and law. Tutorials. (In French)



2021-2022 : Faculty of Medicine Montpellier-Nîmes, University of Montpellier

Inferantial statistics 1. (Master 1): Epidemiology, Health Data, Biostatistics. Lectures, tutorials and practicals with the R software. (In French).
Statistics 2. (5th year): Speech Therapy. Lectures and Practical work. (In French).
Statistics 1. (2nd year): Speech Therapy. Lectures. (In French).
Statistics. (“PASS”) : Specific Health Access Pathway. Tutorials. (In French).
Office Automation-c2i. (2nd year): DFG Medical Sciences. Practical work. (In French).
Computer Training. (2nd year): Midwifery. Practical work. (In French).



2019-2021 : Faculty of Sciences of Montpellier, University of Montpellier

Descriptive Statistics and Probability. (2nd year) : Computer Science. Tutorials. (In French).
Biostatistics 1. (2nd year) : Life Sciences and Polytechnic Engineering School Track. Tutorials. (In French).
Analysis. (2nd year) : Polytechnic Engineering School Track. Tutorials. (In French).
Elementary Probability and Statistics. (2nd year) : Mathematics. Tutorials. (In French).
